lead_paragraph: After addressing their holes in the pitching rotation early in free agency, the San Francisco Giants filled their biggest remaining need Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Giants and OF Denard Span Agree to $31 Million, 3-Year Deal
headline.main: Giants and OF Denard Span Agree to $31 Million, 3-Year Deal
